title: Brixton Chiropractic & Acupuncture
cleaned_text: Welcome to Brixton Chiropractic & Acupuncture Our Approach At Brixton Chiropractic and Acupuncture, located in Oklahoma City, our mission is to help our patients live their best lives free from pain. We believe that no one should have to suffer, especially as they age, and we are committed to providing the highest level of care to ensure our patients are comfortable. Whether you've been injured in an accident or struggle with everyday activities, we're here to help. Our chiropractic and acupuncture services are designed to manage pain and improve your overall well-being. Our experienced practitioners will work with you to create a customized treatment plan that meets your unique needs. Experience relief today with Brixton Chiropractic and Acupuncture. OUR SERVICES - Acupuncture - Nutritional Counseling - Massage Therapy - Chiropractic Care - Reverse Medspa Get relief today by seeing a Brixton professional Though pain itself is uncomfortable, when you have chronic pain, life can become unbearable. You may struggle doing your normal day-to-day tasks. You may have trouble concentrating because you are not feeling well. If your spine is not aligned correctly, you may have more problems than just pain. When your spine is not in alignment the way that it should be, it can affect everything that you do, as your spine is connected to your central nervous system. Chiropractic care and spinal alignment allow the body to heal from the inside out. When we have alignment, our body can work together in harmony. Have You Been Injured in An Accident? Brixton Chiropractic Provides the Non-Surgical Decompression to Treat Injuries After a Car Accident. Our Chiropractors are specially trained to identify and treat many injuries that occur from a car accident, as well as many other painful and debilitating conditions. Non-surgical decompression is a popular and effective treatment for: Whiplash Neck and back pain Sciatica (weakness, tingling and pain that spreads down the leg) Diseased and injured spinal nerve roots Herniated or bulging discs Degenerative disc disease Posterior facet syndrome (worn spinal joints) After a car accident, it's important to be evaluated and start chiropractic treatment, including non-surgical spinal decompression, immediately to improve your chances for a full, speedy recovery — Let Brixton Chiropractic assist
